titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 401 South Washington Street in Chillicothe, Missouri, as the "Jerry L. Litton United States Post Office Building".

An Act to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 401 South Washington Street in Chillicothe, Missouri, as the "Jerry L. Litton United States Post Office Building", and to authorize travel and transportation expenses for certain Federal career appointees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Miss Collins (MI) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Glenn with an amendment and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 563.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Amendment SP 2573 proposed by Senator Sarbanes for Senator Pryor.
Amendment SP 2573 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Ms. Norton asked unanimous consent that the House agree with amendments to the Senate amendments.
On motion that the House agree with amendments to the Senate amendments Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and at the desk: House amendments to Senate amendments.
Senate agreed to the House amendments to the Senate amendments by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/19/1994--House agreed to Senate amendment with amendment. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 401 South Washington Street, Chillicothe, Missouri, as the Jerry L. Litton United States Post Office Building. Provides for travel and transportation expenses for the family of a career appointee in the Senior Executive Service who dies after transferring in the interest of the Government to an official duty station and who was eligible for an annuity at the time of his or her death.
